QuestData.Title: WANTED: Thaelis the Hungerer
QuestData.Description: The city of Silvermoon hereby issues a reward for the head of Thaelis the Hungerer, notorious Wretched ringleader. He is wanted for repeated crimes against the general populace of Silvermoon City, including the murder of two city guards.$B$BReport to Sergeant Kan'ren to collect the reward.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Thaelis's Head to Sergeant Kan'ren at Falconwing Square in Eversong Woods.
QuestData.CompletionText: You have something to show me?
QuestData.RewardText: That scoundrel, Thaelis, finally met his fate. Good job, $N. Things should be quiet with the Wretched for a while.
